about.title: Beyond the Code
about.subtitle: I am passionate about contributing to the digital world through creative and innovative solutions.
about.p1: Informatics Engineering graduate with core competencies in modern web interface development using HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and frameworks such as React.js and Tailwind CSS.
about.p2: Experienced in building responsive frontend features, implementing user interface designs, and collaborating in cross-functional product development through the Bangkit Academy 2024 program.

data.ewastepas_desc: A platform for electronic waste collection built with React and Tailwind CSS.
data.babygrowth_desc: Backend RESTful API for predicting infant growth using Node.js and GCP.
data.taskflow_desc: Modern project management platform with real-time collaboration and analytics.
data.ecommerce_desc: A comprehensive dashboard built with React 19 and Recharts.
data.social_desc: Real-time social platform with WebSocket integration.
data.exp_gdc_company: Google Developer On Campus – Universitas Pasundan
data.exp_gdc_desc: Developed practical learning materials related to Google Cloud Platform, API integration, and deployment workflows. Conducted internal workshops and mentoring sessions.
data.exp_bangkit_company: Bangkit Academy led by Google, Tokopedia, Gojek, & Traveloka
data.exp_bangkit_desc: Studied cloud architecture, REST API integration, and deployment using Google Cloud Platform. Developed a collaborative capstone project integrating Machine Learning, backend API, and Compute Engine.
data.exp_granesia_desc: Assisted in building the company's profile website using PHP, HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Responsible for page structure, interface layout, and ensuring responsive design.
data.edu_unpas_desc: Focus on web application development, user interface design, and responsive web design. Participating in the 2024 Bangkit Academy Cloud Computing Program.
data.edu_smk_desc: Focus on web-based system development and application programming. Final Score: 85.8/100
